otherfeatures: Easy to install, install on the tail handle or license plate light, with screws for convenient to install; 170' viewing angle, can clear show the kids or the stone as parking; Colorful high definition, with scale rearview camera, clear, waterproof, shock resistant, with automatic white balance and anti-interference function; Glimmer night vision; Electron marker line; Video cable connects to monitor, the backup monitoring system start working automatically; Designed for license plate light hole, convenient and easy to install
